title: You’ve got my mail
description:
We use email for practically everything. But can we really trust it with some of our most sensitive information? Recode’s Sara Morrison (@saramorrison) explains.
Read Sara’s story here: https://www.vox.com/recode/22620276/what-to-do-when-you-get-someone-elses-email-security-vulnerabilities-gmail-inbox-invasion
This episode was made by: 


Host: Rani Molla (@ranimolla)


Producer: Sofi LaLonde (@sofilalonde)


Engineer: Melissa Pons (Hemlock Creek Productions)



Support Recode Daily by making a financial contribution to Vox! bit.ly/givepodcasts
